GE07bhg4c13u:2: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:3: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c13u:5: bhaktānām aham uddhartā saṃsārād ity avādi yat /
GE07bhg4c13u:8: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha [Gītā 12.7] iti pūrvaṃ pratijñātam /
GE07bhg4c13u:9: na cātma-jñānaṃ vinā saṃsārād uddharaṇaṃ sambhavatīti tattva-jñānopadeśārthaṃ prakṛti-puruṣa-vivekādhyāya ārabhyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:10: tatra yat saptame 'dhyāye aparā parā ceti prakṛti-dvayam uktaṃ tayor avivekāj jīva-bhāvam āpannasya cid-aṃśasyāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:11: yābhyāṃ ca jīvopabhogārtham īśvarasya sṛṣṭy-ādiṣu pravṛttiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:12: tad eva prakṛti-dvayaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-śabda-vācyaṃ parasparaṃ viviktaṃ tattvato nirūpayiṣyan bhagavān uvāca idam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:13: idaṃ bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetram ity abhidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:15: etad yo vetti ahaṃ mameti manyate taṃ kṣetrajña iti prāhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:21: jyotiḥ kiṃcana yogino yadi paraṃ paśyanti paśyantu te /
GE07bhg4c13u:22: asmākaṃ tu tad eva locana-camatkārāya bhūyāc ciraṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:23: kālindī-pulineṣu yat kim api tan nīlaṃ maho dhāvati //
GE07bhg4c13u:24: prathama-madhyama-ṣaṭkayos tat-tvaṃ-padārthāv uktāv uttaras tu ṣaṭko vākyārtha-niṣṭhaḥ samyag-dhī-pradhāno 'dhunārabhyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:25: tatra - teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarād bhavāmi [Gītā 12.7] iti prāg uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:26: na cātma-jñāna-lakṣaṇān mṛtyor ātma-jñānaṃ vinoddharaṇaṃ sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c13u:27: ato yādṛśenātma-jñānena mṛtyu-saṃsāra-nivṛttir yena ca tattva-jñānena yuktā adveṣṭṛtvādi-guṇa-śālinaḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ prāgvyākhyātās tadātma-tattva-jñānaṃ vaktavyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:28: tac cādvitīyena paramātmanā saha jīvasyābhedam eva viṣayīkaroti /
GE07bhg4c13u:30_0: tatra jīvānāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ pratikṣetraṃ bhinnānām asaṃsāriṇaikena paramātmanā katham
GE07bhg4c13u:30_1: abhedaḥ syād ity āśaṅkāyāṃ saṃsārasya bhinnatvasya cāvidyā-kalpitānātma-dharmatvān
GE07bhg4c13u:30_2: na jīvasya saṃsāritvaṃ bhinnatvaṃ ceti vacanīyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:31: tad arthaṃ dehendriyāntaḥ-karaṇebhyaḥ kṣetrebhyo vivekena kṣetrajñaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ pratikṣetram eka eva nirvikāra iti pratipādanāya kṣetra-kṣetrajña-vivekaḥ kriyate 'sminn adhyāye /
GE07bhg4c13u:32: tatra ye dve prakṛtī bhūmy-ādi-kṣetra-rūpatayā jīva-rūpa-kṣetrajñatayā cāpara-para-śabda-vācye sūcite tad-vivekena tattvaṃ nirūpayiṣyan śrī-bhagavān uvāca idaṃ śarīram iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:33: idam indriyāntaḥ-karaṇa-sahitaṃ bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ he kaunteya /
GE07bhg4c13u:36: etad yo vetti ahaṃ mamety abhimanyate taṃ kṣetrajña iti prāhuḥ kṛṣībalavat tat-phala-bhoktṛtvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:38_0: atra cābhidhīyata iti karmaṇi prayogeṇa kṣetrasya jaḍatvāt karmatvaṃ kṣetrajña-śabde
GE07bhg4c13u:38_1: ca dvityāṃ vinaveti-śabdam āharan svaprakāśatvāt karmatvābhāvam avivekina evāhuḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:38_2: sthūla-dṛśām agocaratvād iti kathayituṃ vilakṣaṇa-vacana-vyaktyaikatra kartṛ-padopādānena
GE07bhg4c13u:41: jñānādiṣv api tiṣṭhet tat sārthakī-karaṇā yayā //
GE07bhg4c13u:43: tan-madhye kevalā bhaktir api bhaṅgyā prakṛṣyate //
GE07bhg4c13u:45: jñānasya sādhanaṃ jīvaḥ prakṛtiś ca viśiṣyate //
GE07bhg4c13u:46: tad evaṃ dvitīyena ṣaṭkena kevalayā bhaktyā bhagavat-prāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:48_0: atha prathama-ṣatkoditānāṃ niṣkāmakarma-yogināṃ bhakti-miśra-jñāṇād eva mokṣas tac
GE07bhg4c13u:48_1: ca jñānaṃ saṅkṣepād uktam api punaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajñādi-vivecanena vivarituṃ tṛitīyaṃ ṣaṭkam ārabhate //
GE07bhg4c13u:49: tatra kiṃ kṣetraṃ kaḥ kṣetrajña ity apekṣāyām āha idam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:50: idaṃ sendriyaṃ bhogāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetraṃ saṃsārasya praroha-bhūmitvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:51: tad yo vetti bandha-daśāyām ahaṃ-mamety abhimanyamānaṃ sva-sambandhitvenaiva jānāti,
GE07bhg4c13u:53: tam ubhayāvasthaṃ jīvaṃ kṣetrajñam iti prāhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:54: kṛṣībalavat sa eva kṣetrajñas tat-phala-bhoktā ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:59: māyāmayaṃ veda sa veda vedam // iti / [BhP 11.12.23]
GE07bhg4c13u:60: asyārthaḥ gṛdhnantīti gṛdhrā grāmecarā baddha-jīvā asya vṛkṣasyakaṃ phalaṃ duḥkham adanti,
GE07bhg4c13u:62: araṇya-vāsā haṃsā mukta-jīvā eka-phalaṃ sukham adanti,
GE07bhg4c13u:64: evam ekam api saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ bahuvidha-naraka-svargāpavarga-prāpakatvād bahu-rūpaṃ māyā-śakti-samudbhūtatvān māyāmayam /
GE07bhg4c13u:65: ijyaiḥ pūjyair gurubhiḥ kṛtvā yo vedeti tad-vidaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor veditāraḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c13u:69: bhaktau pūrvopadiṣṭāyāṃ jñānaṃ dvāraṃ bhavaty ataḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:72: madhya-ṣatke tu bhakti-śabditaṃ paramātmopāsanaṃ tan-mahima-nigada-pūrvakam upadiṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c13u:73: tac ca kevalaṃ tad-vaśyatākaraṃ sat tat-prāpakam /
GE07bhg4c13u:74: ārtādīnāṃ tu tam upāsīnānām ārti-vināśādi-karaṃ tad-ekānti-prasaṅgena kevalaṃ sat tat-prāpakaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:75: yogena jñānena copasṛṣṭaṃ tv aiśvarya-pradhāna-tad-rūpopalambhakaṃ mocakaṃ cety uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:76: tathāsminn antya-ṣatke prakṛti-puruṣa-tat-saṃyoga-hetuka-jagat tad-īśvara-svarūpāṇi karma-jñāna-bhakti-svarūpāṇi ca vivicyante /
GE07bhg4c13u:77: jñāna-vaiśadyāya etāvat trayogaśe 'sminn adhyāye deha-jīva-pareśa-svarūpāṇi vivecanīyāni /
GE07bhg4c13u:78: dehādi-viviktasyāpi jīvātmano deha-sambandha-hetus tad-vivekānusandhi-prakāraś ca vimarśanīyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:79: tad idam arthajātam abhidhātuṃ bhagavān uvāca idam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:80: he kaunteya idaṃ sendriya-prāṇaṃ śarīraṃ bhoktur jīvasya bhogya-sukha-duḥkhādi-prarohakatvāt kṣetram ity abhidhīyate tattva-jñaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:81: etac charīraṃ devo 'haṃ mānavo 'haṃ sthūlo 'ham ity ajñair ātma-bhedena pratīyamānam api yaḥ śayyāsanādivad-ātmano bhannam ātma-bhoga-mokṣa-sādhanaṃ ca vetti,
GE07bhg4c13u:83: tad-veditṛtayā bhinnaṃ tad-vidaḥ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-svarūpa-jñāḥ kṣetrajñam iti prāhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:88: māyā-mayaṃ veda sa veda vedam // iti / [BhP 11.12.23]
GE07bhg4c13u:93: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarva-kṣetreṣu bhārata /
GE07bhg4c13u:94: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama //2//
GE07bhg4c13u:95: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ saṃsāriṇaḥ svarūpam uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:96: idānīṃ tasyaiva pāramārthikam asaṃsāri-svarūpam āha kṣetrajñam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:97: ta ca kṣetrajñaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ jīvaṃ vastutaḥ sarva-kṣetreṣv anugataṃ mām eva viddhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:98: tattvam asi iti śrutyā lakṣitena cid-aṃśena mad-rūpasyoktatvāt ādarārtham eva taj-jñānaṃ stauti /
GE07bhg4c13u:99: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yad evaṃ vailakṣaṇeyan jñānaṃ tad eva mokṣa-hetutvān mama jñanaṃ matam /
GE07bhg4c13u:107: evaṃ dehendriyādi-vilakṣaṇaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ kṣetrajñam abhidhāya tasya pāramārthikaṃ tattvam asaṃsāri-paramātmanaikyam āha kṣetrajñam apīti /
GE07bhg4c13u:108_0: sarva-kṣetreṣu ya ekaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ svaprakāśa-caitanya-rūpo nityo vibhuś ca tam avidyādhyāropita-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvādi-saṃsāra-dharmaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:108_1: kṣetrajñam avidyaka-rūpa-parityāgena mām īśvaram asaṃsāriṇam advitīya-brahmānanda-rūpaṃ viddhi jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:111_0: kṣetrajñaś ca paramārtha-satyas tad-bhramādhiṣṭhānam iti kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor yaj
GE07bhg4c13u:111_1: jñānaṃ tad eva mokṣa-sādhanatvāj jñānam avidyā-virodhi-prakāśa-rūpaṃ mama matam anyat
GE07bhg4c13u:111_2: tv ajñānam eva tad-virodhitvād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:112: atra jīveśvarayor āvidyako bhedaḥ pāramārthikas tv abheda ity atra yuktayo bhāṣya-kṛdbhir varṇitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:113: asmābhis tu grantha-vistara-bhayāt prāg eva bahudhoktatvāc ca nopanyastāḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c13u:116: paramātmanas tu tato 'pi kārtsnyena sarva-kṣetrajñatvāt kṣetrajñatvam āha kṣetrajñam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:117: sarva-kṣetreṣu niyantṛtvena sthitaṃ māṃ paramātmānaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:118: jīvānāṃ pratyekam akaika-kṣetra-jñnānāṃ tad api na kṛtsnam /
GE07bhg4c13u:119: mama tv ekasyaiva sarva-kṣetrajñatvaṃ kṛtsnam eveti viśeṣo jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:120: kiṃ jñānam ity apekṣāyām āha kṣetreṇa saha kṣetrajñayor jīvātma-paramātanor yaj jñānaṃ kṣetra-jīvātma-paramātmanāṃ yaj jñānam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:121: tad eva jñānaṃ mama mataṃ sammataṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:124: atha paramātmanas tad āha kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi mām iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:125: he bhārat sarva-kṣetreṣu māṃ ca kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:127: jīvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ kṣetraṃ svabhoga-mokṣa-sādhanaṃ jānantaḥ kṣetrajñāḥ prajāvat /
GE07bhg4c13u:128: ahaṃ tu sarveśvara eka eva sarvāṇi tāni bhartavyāni ca jānan tat-sarva-kṣetrajño rājavad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:135: kiṃ jñānam ity apekṣāyām āha kṣetreti /
GE07bhg4c13u:137: tat-sahitayos tayor mitho vivekena yaj-jñānaṃ tad eva jñānaṃ mama matam /
GE07bhg4c13u:139_1: mithaḥ-sampṛktānām api teṣāṃ na tat tad-dharma-sāṅkaryaṃ citrāmbara-rūpavad ity evam
GE07bhg4c13u:139_2: āha sūtrakāraḥ -- na tu dṛṣṭānta-bhāvāt iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:155_0: atrāpi kṣarākṣara-śabda-bodhyāt kṣetra-kṣetrajña-rūpād yugalāt svasya puruṣottamasyānyatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:155_1: vakṣyati dvāv imau puruṣau ity ādibhis tasmān mithaḥ sampṛktānām api prakṛty-ādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:156: yat tv ekātma-vādinaḥ kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi ity atra sāmānādhikaraṇya-pratītyā sarveśvarasyaiva sato 'syā vidyayaiva kṣetrajña-bhāvo rajjor iva bhujaṅgamatvam /
GE07bhg4c13u:157_0: tan-nivṛttaye harer āptatamasyedaṃ vākyaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi mām iti rajjur iyaṃ na
GE07bhg4c13u:157_1: bhujaṅga ity āpta-vākyād bhujaṅgatva-bhrāntir iva kṣetrajñatva-bhrāntir asmād vākyād
GE07bhg4c13u:157_2: vinaśyatīty āhus tat kilopadeśyāsambhavād eva nirastam iti dehino 'smin ity asya bhāṣye draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:160: kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ ca mām eva viddhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:163: tayor mad-adhīna-pravṛttikatvādibhir mad-ātmakatayā yaj-jñānaṃ taj jñānaṃ mama matam ito 'nyathā tv amatam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:166: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yad-vikāri yataś ca yat /
GE07bhg4c13u:167: sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu //3//
GE07bhg4c13u:168: śrīdharaḥ : tatra yady api caturviṃśatyā bhedair bhinnā prakṛtiḥ kṣetram ity ābhipretaṃ tathāpi deha-rūpeṇa pariṇatāyām eva tasyām ahaṃ-bhāvena avivekaḥ sphuṭa iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:169: tad-vivekārtham idaṃ śarīraṃ kṣetram ity ādy uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:170: tad etat prapañcayiṣyan pratijānīte tad iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:171: yad uktaṃ mayā kṣetraṃ tat kṣetraṃ yat svarūpato jaḍaṃ dṛśyādi-svabhāvām /
GE07bhg4c13u:177: sa ca kṣetrajño yat-svarūpo yat-prabhāvaś ca acintyaiśvarya-yogena yaiḥ prabhāvaiḥ sampannaḥ taṃ sarvaṃ saṅkṣepeto mattaḥ śṛṇu //3//
GE07bhg4c13u:179: saṃkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ vivarītum ārabhate tat kṣetram iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:180: tad idaṃ śarīram iti prāg uktaṃ jaḍa-varga-rūpaṃ kṣetraṃ yac ca svarūpeṇa jaḍa-dṛśya-paricchinnādi-svabhāvaṃ yādṛk cecchādi-dharmakaṃ yad-vikāri yair indriyādi-vikārair yuktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:181: yataś ca kāraṇād yat kāryam utpadyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:183: yad iti yaiḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamādi-bhedair bhinnam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:185: sa ca kṣetrajñayor yaḥ svarūpataḥ sva-prakāśa-caitanyānanda-svabhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:186: yat-prabhāvaś ca ye prabhāvā upādhi-kṛtāḥ śaktayo yasya tat-kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyaṃ sarva-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭaṃ samāsena saṃkṣepeṇa me mama vacanāc chṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c13u:189: saṅkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ vivaritum ārabhate tat kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ yac ca mahābhūta-prāṇendriyādi-saṅghāta-rūpam /
GE07bhg4c13u:193: yad iti yaiḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamādi-bhedair bhinnam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:195: yat tad iti napuṃsakam anapuṃsakennaikavac ceti eka-śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:197: baladevaḥ : saṅkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ viśadayitum āha tad iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:198: tat kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ yac ca yad dravyaṃ yādṛk yad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ yad-vikāri yair vikārair upetaṃ /
GE07bhg4c13u:199: yataś ca hetor udbhūtaṃ yat prayojanakaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:201: sa ca kṣetrajño jīva-lakṣaṇaḥ pareśa-lakṣaṇaś ca yo yat svarūpo ya-prabhāvo yac-chaktikaś ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:205: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak /
GE07bhg4c13u:207: śrīdharaḥ : kair vistareṇoktasyāyaṃ saṅkṣepa ity apekṣāyām āha ṛṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:209: yoga-śāstreṣu dhyāna-dhāraṇādi-viṣayatvena virājādirūpeṇa bahudhā gītaṃ nirūpitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:214: brahma sūtryate sūcyate ebhir iti brahma-sūtrāṇi /
GE07bhg4c13u:215: yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante [TaittU 3.1.1] ity ādīni taṭastha-lakṣaṇa-parāṇy upaniṣad-vākyāni /
GE07bhg4c13u:216: tathā ca brahma padyate gamyate sākṣāj jñāyata ebhir iti padāni svarūpa-lakṣaṇa-parāṇi satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma ity ādīni /
GE07bhg4c13u:218: kiṃ ca hetumadbhiḥ sad eva saumyedam agra āsīt katham asataḥ saj jāyeta [Chā 6.2.1] iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:220: kaḥ prāṇyāt yad eṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt eṣa hy evānandayati [TaittU 2.7.1] ity ādi yuktimadbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:222: prāṇyāt prāṇa-vyāpāraṃ vā kaḥ kuryāt iti śruti-padayor arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:224: tad evam etair vistareṇoktaṃ duḥsaṅgrahaṃ saṅkṣepatas tubhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c13u:226: yad vā athāto brahma-jijñāsā [Vs. 1.1.1] ity ādīni brahma-sūtrāṇi gṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c13u:227: tāny eva brahma padyate niścīyate ebhir iti padāni /
GE07bhg4c13u:229: ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt [Vs 1.1.13] ity ādibhir yuktimadbhir viniścitair ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:232: kair vistareṇoktasyāyaṃ saṃkṣepa ity apekṣāyāṃ śrotṛ-buddhi-prarocanārthaṃ stuvann āha ṛṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:233: ṛṣibhir vasiṣṭhādibhir yoga-śāstreṣu dhāraṇā-dhyāna-viṣayatvena bahudhā gītaṃ nirūpitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:235: vividhair nitya-naimittika-kāmya-karmādi-viṣayaiś chandobhir ṛg-ādi-mantrair brāhmaṇaiś ca pṛthag vivekato gītam /
GE07bhg4c13u:237: brahma-sūtra-padaiś ca brahma sūtryate sūcyate kiṃcid vyavadhānena pratipādyata ebhir iti brahma-sūtrāṇi -- yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante /
GE07bhg4c13u:240: [TaittU 3.1.1] ity ādīni taṭastha-lakṣaṇa-parāṇy upaniṣad-vākyāni tathā padyate brahma sākṣāt pratipādyata ebhir iti padāni svarūpa-lakṣaṇa-parāṇi satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c13u:241: ity ādīni tair brahma-sūtraiḥ padaiś ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:242_0: hetumadbhiḥ -- sad eva saumyedam agra āsīd.. ekam evādvitīyam [Chā 6.2.1] ity upakramya
GE07bhg4c13u:242_1: tad dhaika āhur asad evedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyaṃ tasmād asataḥ saj jāyate iti
GE07bhg4c13u:242_2: nāstika-matam upanyasya kutas tu khalu somyaivaṃ syād iti hovāca katham asataḥ saj
GE07bhg4c13u:242_3: jāyate ity ādi-yuktīḥ pratipādayadbhir viniścitair upakramopasaṃhāraika-vākyatayā
GE07bhg4c13u:244: evam etair ativastareṇoktaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa tubhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:245: athavā brahma-sūtrāṇi tāni padāni ceti karma-dhārayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:246: tatra vidyā-sūtrāṇi ātmety evopāsīta ity ādīni avidyā-sūtrāṇi na sa veda yathā paśuḥ ity ādīni tair gītam iti //4//
GE07bhg4c13u:248: kair vistareṇoktasyāyaṃ saṅkṣepa ity apekṣāyām āha ṛṣibhir vaśiṣṭhādibhir yoga-śāstreṣu /
GE07bhg4c13u:250: brahma-sūtrāṇi athāto brahma-jijñāsā [Vs. 1.1.1] ity ādīni tāny eva sūtrāṇi /
GE07bhg4c13u:251: brahma padyate jñāyate ebhir iti tāni /
GE07bhg4c13u:254: ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt [Vs. 1.1.13] iti yuktimadbhir viniścitair viśeṣato niścitārthaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:255: baladevaḥ : idaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-yāthātmyaṃ kair vistareṇoktaṃ yat samāsena brūṣa ity apekṣāyām āha ṛṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:256: ṛṣibhiḥ parāśarādibhir etat kṣetrādi-svarūpaṃ bahudhā gītam -
GE07bhg4c13u:257: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye bhūtair uhyāma pārthiva /
GE07bhg4c13u:259: karma-vaśyā guṇā hy ete sattvādyāḥ pṛthivī-pate /
GE07bhg4c13u:261: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:264_0: tathā chandobhir vedair vividhair sarvair bahudhā tad gītaṃ yajuḥ-śākhāyāṃ tasmād
GE07bhg4c13u:264_1: vā etasmād ātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ [TaittU 2.1.3] ity ādinā brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā
GE07bhg4c13u:264_3: puruṣāḥ paṭhitās teṣv anna-mayādi-trayaṃ jaḍaṃ kṣetra-svarūpaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:265: tato bhinno vijñāna-mayo jīvas tasya bhokteti jīva-kṣetrajña-svarūpaṃ /
GE07bhg4c13u:266: tasmāc ca bhinnaḥ sarvāntara ānanda-maya itīśvara-kṣetrajña-svarūpam uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:268: brahma-sūtra-rūpaiḥ padair vākyaiś ca tad-yāthātmyaṃ gītam /
GE07bhg4c13u:269: teṣu na viyad aśruteḥ [Vs. 2.3.1] ity ādinā kṣetra-svarūpaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:271: parāt tu tac chruteḥ [Vs. 2.3.39] ity ādineśvara-svarūpam /
GE07bhg4c13u:275: mahā-bhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:277: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:279: śrīdharaḥ : tatra kṣetra-svarūpam āha mahābhūtānīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c13u:286: indriya-goccarāś ca pañca tan-mātra-rūpā eva śabdādaya ākāśādi-viśeṣa-guṇatayā vyaktāḥ santa indriya-viṣayāḥ pañca tad evaṃ caturviṃśati-tattvāni uktāni //5//
GE07bhg4c13u:295: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva [BAU 1.5.3] iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:296: anena ca yādṛg iti pratijñātāḥ kṣetra-dharmā darśitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:297: etat kṣetraṃ savikāram indriyādi-vikāra-sahitaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa tubhyaṃ mayoktam iti kṣetropasaṃhāraḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c13u:299: evaṃ prarocitāyārjunāya kṣetra-svarūpaṃ tāvad āha dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c13u:303: avyaktaṃ tat-kāraṇaṃ sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇātmakaṃ pradhānaṃ sarva-kāraṇaṃ na kasyāpi kāryam /
GE07bhg4c13u:308: aupaniṣadānāṃ tu avyaktam avyākṛtam anirvacanīyaṃ māyākhyā pārameśvarī śaktiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:311: ahaṅkāra īkṣaṇānantaram ahaṃ bahu syām iti saṅkalpaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:313: hy avyakta-mahad-ahaṅkārāḥ sāṅkhya-siddhā aupaniṣadair upagamyante 'śabdatvādi-hetubhir iti sthitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:314: māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram [ŚvetU 4.10] te dhyāna-yogānugatā apaśyan devātma-śaktiṃ sva-guṇair nigūḍhām [ŚvetU 1.3] iti śruti-pratipāditam avyaktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:317: tasmād vā etasmād ātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:321: adbhyaḥ pṛthivī [TaittU 1.1] iti pañca bhūtāni śrautāni /
GE07bhg4c13u:323: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca śrotra-tvak-cakṣū-rasana-ghrāṇākhyāni pañca buddhīndriyāṇi vāk-pāṇi-pāda-pāyūpasthākhyāni pañca karmendriyāṇīti tāni /
GE07bhg4c13u:325: pañca cendriya-goccarāḥ śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhās te buddhīndriyāṇāṃ jñāpyatvena viṣayāḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ tu kāryatvena /
GE07bhg4c13u:327: icchā sukhe tat-sādhane cedaṃ me bhūyād iti spṛhātmā citta-vṛttiḥ kāma iti rāga iti cocyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:328: dveṣo duḥkhe tat-sādhane cedaṃ me mā bhūd iti spṛhā-virodhinī citta-vṛttiḥ krodha itīrṣyeti cocyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:335: tathā ca śrutiḥ - kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhā dhṛtir hrīr dhīr
GE07bhg4c13u:336: bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva [BAU 1.5.3] iti mṛd-ghaṭa itivad upādānābhedena kāryāṇāṃ kāmādīnāṃ mano-dharmatvam āha /
GE07bhg4c13u:337: etat paridṛśyamānaṃ sarvaṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ jaḍaṃ kṣetrajñena sākṣiṇāvabhāsyamānatvāt tad-anātmakaṃ kṣetraṃ bhāsyam acetanaṃ samāsenodāhṛtam uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:338: nanu śarīrendriya-saṃghāta eva cetanaḥ kṣetrajña iti lokāyatikāḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:341: tat kathaṃ kṣetram evaitat sarvam iti ?
GE07bhg4c13u:343: vikāro janmādir nāśāntaḥ pariṇāmo nairuktaiḥ paṭhitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:344: tat-sahitaṃ sa-vikāram idaṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antam ato na vikāra-sākṣi svotpatti-vināśayoḥ svena draṣṭum aśakyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:345: anyeṣām api sva-dharmāṇāṃ sva-darśanam antareṇa darśanānupapatteḥ svenaiva sva-darśane ca kartṛ-karma-virodhān nirvikāra eva sarva-vikāra-sākṣī / tad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c13u:346: na rte syād vikriyāṃ duḥkhī sākṣitā kā vikāriṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:348: tena vikāritvam eva kṣetra-cihnaṃ na tu parigaṇanam ity arthaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c13u:350: tatra kṣetrasya svarūpam āha mahābhūtāny ākāśādīny ahaṅkāras tat-kāraṇam /
GE07bhg4c13u:355: indriya-gocarāḥ pañca śabdādayo viṣayās tad evaṃ caturviṃśati-tattvātmakam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:358: cetanā jñānātmikā mano-vṛttir dhṛtir dhairyam icchādayaś caite mano-dharmā eva na tv ātma-dharmāḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:361: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhā dhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva [BAU 1.5.3] iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:362: anena yādṛg iti pratijñātāḥ kṣetra-dharmā darśitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:365: baladevaḥ : tat kṣetraṃ yac ca ity ādyārdhakena vaktuṃ pratijñātaṃ kṣetra-svarūpam āha -- mahābhūtānīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c13u:366: mahābhūtāni pañca khādīny ahaṅkāras tad-dhetus tāmaso bhūtādi-saṃjño buddhis tad-dheutr jñāna-pradhāno mahān avyaktaṃ tad-dhetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:367_0: triguṇāvasthaṃ pradhānam indriyāṇi śrotrādīni pañca vāg-ādīni ca pañceti bhūtādi-khādy-antarālikāḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:367_1: sūkṣmāḥ śabdādi-tanmātrāḥ khādi-viśeṣa-guṇatayā vyaktāḥ santaḥ sthūlāḥ śrotrādi-pañcaka-grāhyā viṣayā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:369: icchādayaś catvāraḥ prasiddhāḥ saṅkalpādīnām upalakṣaṇam etat /
GE07bhg4c13u:370: ete manodharmāḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhā dhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:371: yadyapy ātma-dharmā icchādayo ya ātmā ity ādau
GE07bhg4c13u:373: paṭhed ya icchet puruṣaḥ iti sahasranāma-stotrāt,
GE07bhg4c13u:374: puruṣaḥ sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur uchyate iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca,
GE07bhg4c13u:378: sa ca cetanā dhṛitr bhogāya mokṣāya ca yatamānasya cetanasya jīvasyādhāratayotpanna ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:380: ya cety asya śrotrādīndiriyāṇi śrotrāśritānīti yādṛg ity asyencchādīni kṣetra-kāryāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c13u:384: etat kṣetraṃ savikāraṃ janmādi-ṣaḍ-vikāropetam udāhṛtam uktam //5-6//
GE07bhg4c13u:396: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā //11//
GE07bhg4c13u:397: śrīdharaḥ : idānīm ukta-lakṣaṇāt kṣetrāt atiriktatayā jñeyaṃ śuddhaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ vistareṇa varṇayiṣyan śuddha-jñāna-sādhanāny āha amānitvam iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:414: etaj jñānam iti proktam iti pañcamenānvayaḥ //
GE07bhg4c13u:420: taṃ deśaṃ sevituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tasya bhāvas tattvam /
GE07bhg4c13u:421: prākṛtānāṃ janānāṃ saṃsadi sabhāyām aratī raty-abhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:426: tattva-jñānasyārthaḥ prayojanaṃ mokṣas tasya darśanaṃ mokṣasya sarvotkṛṣṭatvālocanam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:427: etad amānitvam adambhitvam ity ādi viṃśati-saṅkhyakaṃ yad uktam etaj jñānam iti proktaṃ vaśiṣṭhādibhiḥ jñāna-sādhanatvāt
GE07bhg4c13u:428: /ato 'nyathāsmād viparītaṃ mānitvādi yat tad ajñānam iti proktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:429: jñāna-virodhitvāt ataḥ sarvathā tyājyam ity arthaḥ //7-11//
GE07bhg4c13u:431_0: evaṃ kṣetraṃ pratipādya tat-sākṣiṇaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ kṣetrād vivekena vistarāt pratipādayituṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:431_1: taj-jñāna-yogyatvāyāmānitvādi-sādhanāny āha jñeyaṃ yat tad ity ataḥ prāktanaiḥ pañcabhiḥ amānitvam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:432: vidyamānair avidyamānair vā guṇair ātmanaḥ ślāghanaṃ mānitvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:435: teṣāṃ varjanam amānitvam adambhitvam ahiṃsety uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:436: parāparādhe citta-vikāra-hetau prāpte 'pi nirvikāra-cittatayā tad-aparādha-sahanaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:437: ārjavam akauṭilyaṃ yathā-hṛdayaṃ vyavaharaṇaṃ para-pratāraṇā-rāhityam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c13u:438: ācāryo mokṣa-sādhanasyopadeṣṭātra vivakṣito na tu manūkta upanīyādhyāpakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:441: śaucaṃ bāhyaṃ kāya-malānāṃ mṛj-jalābhyāṃ kṣālanam ābhyantaraṃ ca mano-malānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ viṣaya-doṣa-darśana-rūpa-pratipakṣa-bhāvanayāpanayanam /
GE07bhg4c13u:442: sthairyaṃ mokṣa-sādhane pravṛttasyāneka-vidha-vighna-prāptāv api tad-aparityāgena punaḥ punar yatrādhikyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:443: ātma-vinigraha ātmano dehendriya-saṃghātasya svabhāva-prāptāṃ mokṣa-pratikūle pravṛttiṃ nirudhya mokṣa-sādhana eva vyavasthāpanam //7//
GE07bhg4c13u:444: kiṃ ca - indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu dṛṣṭeṣv ānuśravikeṣu vā bhogeṣu rāga-virodhiny aspṛhātmikā citta-vṛttir vairāgyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:445: ātma-ślāghanābhāve 'pi manasi prādurbhūto 'haṃ sarvotkṛṣṭa iti garvo 'haṅkāras tad-abhāvo 'nahaṅkāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:448: tenāmānitvādīnāṃ viṃśati-saṅkhyākānāṃ samucito yoga eva jñānam iti proktaṃ na tv ekasyāpy abhāva ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:450: kāya-jugupsitatvasya cānudarśanaṃ punaḥ punar ālocanaṃ janmādi-duḥkhānteṣu doṣasyānudarśanaṃ janmādi-vyādhy-anteṣu duḥkha-rūpa-doṣasyānudarśanam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c13u:452: kiṃ ca / saktir mamedam ity etāvan-mātreṇa prītiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:453: abhiṣvaṅgas tv aham evāyam ity ananyatva-bhāvanayā prīty-atiśayo 'nyasmin sukhini duḥkhini vāham eva sukhī duḥkhī ceti /
GE07bhg4c13u:455: kutra sakty-abhiṣvaṅgau varjanīyāv ata āha putra-dāra-gṛhādiṣu putreṣu dāreṣu gṛheṣu /
GE07bhg4c13u:456: ādi-grahaṇād anyeṣv api bhṛtyādiṣu sarveṣu sneha-viṣayeṣv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:457: nityaṃ ca sarvadā ca sama-cittatvaṃ harṣa-viṣāda-śūnya-manastvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu /
GE07bhg4c13u:461: kiṃ ca / mayi ca bhagavati vāsudeve parameśvare bhaktiḥ sarvotkṛṣṭatva-jñāna-pūrvikā prītiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:462: ananya-yogena nānyo bhagavato vāsudevāt paro 'sty ataḥ sa eva no gatir ity evaṃ niścayenāpy avyabhicāriṇī kenāpi pratikūlena hetunā nivārayitum aśakyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:463: sāpi jñāna-hetuḥ prītir na yāvan mayi vāsudeva na mucyate deha-yogena tāvat [BhP 5.5.6] ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:464: viviktaḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃskārato vā śuddho 'śucibhiḥ sarpa-vyāghrādibhiś ca rahitaḥ suradhunī-pulinādi-śrita-prasāda-karo deśas tat-sevana-śīlatvaṃ vivikta-deśa-sevitvam /
GE07bhg4c13u:470_1: tattva-jñāna-pratikūlāyām aratir aramaṇaṃ sādhūnāṃ tu saṃsadi tattva-jñānānukūlāyāṃ ratir ucitaiva /
GE07bhg4c13u:472: saṅgaḥ sarvātmanā heyaḥ sa cety uktaṃ na śakyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:473: sa sadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ sataḥ saṅgo hi bheṣajam // iti //10//
GE07bhg4c13u:474: kiṃ ca / adhyātma-jñānam ātmānam adhikṛtya pravṛttam ātmānātma-viveka-jñānam adhyātma-jñānaṃ tasmin nityatvaṃ tatraiva niṣṭhāvattvam /
GE07bhg4c13u:478: etad amānitvādi-tattva-jñānārtha-darśanāntaṃ viṃśati-saṅkhyākaṃ jñānam iti proktaṃ jñānārthatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:479: ato 'nyathāsmād viparītaṃ mānitvādi yat tad ajñānam iti proktaṃ jñāna-virodhitvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:480: tasmād ajñāna-parityāgena jñānam evopādeyam iti bhāvaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c13u:482: ukta-lakṣaṇāt kṣetrād viviktatayā jñeyau jīvātma-paramātmānau kṣetrajñau vistareṇa varṇayiṣyan taj-jñānasya sādhanāny amānitvādīni viṃśatim āha pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:483: atrāṣṭadaśa bhaktānāṃ jñānināṃ ca sādhāraṇāni kintu bhaktaiḥ mayi cānanya-yogena bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī ity ekam eva bhagavad-anubhava-sādhanatvena yatnataḥ kriyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:484: anyāni spatadaśoktābhyāsavatāṃ teṣāṃ svata evotpadyante na tu teṣu yatna iti sāmpradāyikāḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:485: antime dve tu jñāninām asādhāraṇa eva /
GE07bhg4c13u:487: śaucaṃ bāhyam abhyantaraṃ ca tathā ca smṛtiḥ --
GE07bhg4c13u:493: janmādiṣu duḥkha-rūpasya doṣasyānudarśanaṃ punaḥ punaḥ paryālocanam /

GE07bhg4c13u:718: jñāna-sādhana-sampannānāṃ tu antike ca tad atyavyavahitam evātmatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:719: dūrāt sudūre tad ihāntike paśatsv ihaiva nihitaṃ guhāyām [MuṇḍU 3.1.7] ity ādi śrutibhyaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c13u:721: bhūtānāṃ svakāryāṇāṃ bahiś cāntaś ca yathā dehānām ākāśādikam /
GE07bhg4c13u:722: acaraṃ sthāvaraṃ caraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca bhūta-jātaṃ tad eva /
GE07bhg4c13u:724_0: evam api rūpādibhinnatvāt tad-avijñeyam idaṃ tad iti spaṣṭaṃ jñānārhaṃ na bhavatīty
GE07bhg4c13u:724_1: ata evāviduṣāṃ yojana-koṭy-antaram iva dūrasthaṃ viduṣāṃ punaḥ sva-gṛha-sthitam evāntike
GE07bhg4c13u:724_2: ca tat svadeha evāntaryāmitvāt dūrāt sudūre tad ihāntike ca paśyatsv ihaiva nihitaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:726: bhūtānāṃ cij-jaḍātmakānāṃ tattvānāṃ bahir antaś ca sthitam /

GE07bhg4c13u:728: acaram acalaṃ caraṃ calaṃ ca āsīno dūraṃ vrajati śayāno yāti sarvataḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.21] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:729: sūkṣmatvāt pratyaktvāc cit-sukha-mūrtitvād avijñeyaṃ devatāntaravaj jñātum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:730: ato dūrasthaṃ ceti yan manasā na manute na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam [ŚvetU 4.20] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:731: gāndharva-vāsitena śrotreṇa ṣaḍ-jādivad bhakti-bhāvitena karaṇena tu śakyaṃ taj jñātum ity āha antike ca tad iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:734: bhakti-yoge hi tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.78] ity ādi śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:735: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakyaḥ [Gītā 11.55] ity ādi smṛteś ca //15//
GE07bhg4c13u:738: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:739: bhūta-bhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca //16//
GE07bhg4c13u:741: bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakeṣu avibhaktaṃ kāraṇātmanābhinnaṃ kāryātmanā vibhaktaṃ bhinnam ivāvasthitaṃ ca samudrāj jātaṃ phenādi samudrād anyan na bhavati /

GE07bhg4c13u:743: pralaya-kāle ca grasiṣṇu grasana-śīlaṃ sṛṣṭi-kāle ca prabhaviṣṇu nānā-kāryātmanā prabhavana-śīlam //16//
GE07bhg4c13u:745: yad uktam ekam eva sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhatīti tad vivṛṇoti pratideham ātma-bheda-vādināṃ nirāsāya avibhaktam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:746: bhūteṣu sarva-prāṇiṣu avibhaktam abhinnam ekam eva tat /
GE07bhg4c13u:747: na tu pratidehaṃ bhinnaṃ vyomavat sarva-vyāpakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:748: tathāpi deha-tādātmyena pratīyamānatvāt pratidehaṃ vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:749: aupādikatvenāpāramārthiko vyomnīva tatra bhedāvabhāsa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:751: brahma tu jagat-kāraṇaṃ tato bhinnam eveti /
GE07bhg4c13u:752: nety āha bhūta-bhartṛ ca bhūtāni sarvāṇi sthiti-kāle bibhartīti tathā pralaya-kāle grasiṣṇu grasana-śīlam utpatti-kāle prabhaviṣṇu ca prabhavana-śīlaṃ sarvasya /
GE07bhg4c13u:754: tasmād yaj jagataḥ sthiti-layotpatti-kāraṇaṃ brahma tad eva kṣetrajñaṃ pratideham ekaṃ jñeyaṃ na tato 'nyad ity arthaḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c13u:756: bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakeṣu avibhaktaṃ kāraṇātmanā abhinnaṃ kāryātmanā vibhaktaṃ bhinnam ivā sthitaṃ /
GE07bhg4c13u:762: vibhakteṣu mitho bhinneṣu jīveṣv avibhaktam ekaṃ tad brahma vibhaktam iva prati-jīvaṃ bhinnam iva sthitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:763: ekaṃ santaṃ bahudhā dṛśyamānam iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:769: tac ca bhūta-bhartṛ-sthitau bhūtānāṃ pālakaṃ pralaye teṣāṃ grasiṣṇu kāla-śaktyā saṃhārakaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:771: śrutiś ca yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante yena jātāni jīvanti yat prayanty abhisaṃviśanti tad brahma tad vijijñāsasva [TaittU 3.1.1] iti //16//
GE07bhg4c13u:774: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:775: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam //17//
GE07bhg4c13u:777: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnām api jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ tat /
GE07bhg4c13u:779: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:786: jñānaṃ ca tad eva buddhi-vṛttau abhivyaktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:787: tad eva rūpādy-ākāreṇa jñeyaṃ ca jñāna-gamyaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:789: jñāna-gamyaṃ viśinaṣṭi sarvasya prāṇimātrasya hṛdi viṣṭhitaṃ viśeṣeṇāpracyuta-svarūpeṇa niyantṛtayā sthitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:790: dhiṣṭhitam iti pāṭhe adhiṣṭāya sthitim ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:792: nanu sarvatra vidyamānam api tan nopalabhyate cet tarhi jaḍam eva syāt,
GE07bhg4c13u:793: na syāt svayaṃjyotiṣo 'pi tasya rūpādi-hīnatvenendriyādy-agrāhyatvopapatter ity āha jyotiṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:794: taj jñeyaṃ brahma jyotiṣām avabhāsakānām ādityādīnāṃ buddhy-ādīnāṃ ca bāhyānām āntarāṇām api jyotir avabhāsakaṃ caityanya-jyotiṣo jaḍa-jyotir-avabhāsakatvopapatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:796: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [KaṭhU 2.5.15] ity ādi-śruteś ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:797: vakṣyati ca yad āditya-gataṃ tejaḥ [Gītā 15.8] ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c13u:798_0: svayaṃ jaḍatvābhāve 'pi jaḍa-saṃsṛṣṭaṃ syād iti nety āha tamaso jaḍa-vargāt param
GE07bhg4c13u:798_1: avidyā-tat-kāryābhyām apāramārthikābhyām asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ pāramārthikaṃ tad brahma sad-asatoḥ sambandhāyogāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:799: ucyate akṣarāt parataḥ paraḥ ity ādi-śrutibhir brahma-vādibhiś ca / tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c13u:802: āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteś ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:803: āditya-varṇam iti sva-bhāne prakāśāntarānapekṣaṃ sarvasya prakāśakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:804: yasmāt tat svayaṃ jyotir jaḍāsaṃspṛṣṭam ata eva taj jñānaṃ pramāṇa-janya-ceto-vṛtty-abhivyakta-saṃvid-rūpam /
GE07bhg4c13u:805: ata eva tad eva jñeyaṃ jātum arham ajñātatvāj jaḍasyājñātatvābhāvena jñātum anarhatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:806_0: kathaṃ tarhi sarvair na jñāyate tatrāha jñāna-gamyaṃ pūrvoktenāmānitvādinā tattva-jñānārtha-darśanāntena
GE07bhg4c13u:806_1: sādhana-kalāpena jñāna-hetutayā jñāna-śabditena gamyaṃ prāpyaṃ na tu tad vinety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:807: nanu sādhanena gamyaṃ cet tat kiṃ deśāntara-vyavahitam ?
GE07bhg4c13u:808_0: nety āha hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitaṃ sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya hṛdi buddhau viṣṭhitaṃ sarvatra
GE07bhg4c13u:808_1: sāmānyena sthitam api viśeṣa-rūpeṇa tatra sthitam abhivyaktaṃ jīva-rūpeṇāntaryāmi-rūpeṇa ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:810: avyavahitam eva vastuto bhrāntyā vyavahitam iva sarva-bhrama-kāraṇājñāna-nivṛttyā prāpyata ivety arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c13u:812: jyotiṣāṃ candrādityānām api taj jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ /
GE07bhg4c13u:814: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:819: ata eva tamaso 'jñānāt paraṃ tenāsaṃsṛṣṭam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:821: jñānaṃ tad eva buddhi-vṛttau abhivyaktaṃ sat jñānam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:822: tad eva rūpādy-ākāreṇa pariṇataṃ jñeyaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:823: tad eva jñāna-gamyaṃ pūrvoktenāmānitvādi-jñāna-sādhanena prāpyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:824: tad eva paramātma-svarūpaṃ sat sarvasya prāṇimātrasya hṛdi dhiṣṭhitaṃ niyantṛtayādhbiṣṭhāya sthitam ity arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c13u:825: baladevaḥ : jyotiṣāṃ sūrydīnām api tad brahma jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ /
GE07bhg4c13u:826: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:831: tad brahma tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ paraṃ tenāspṛṣṭam ucyate āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt [ŚvetU 3.8] ity śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:832: jñānaṃ cid-eka-rasam ucyate vijñānam ānanda-ghanaṃ brahma [GTU 2.79?] iti śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:833: jñānaṃ mumukṣoḥ śaraṇatvena jñātum arham ucyate taṃ ha devam ātma-buddhi-prakāśaṃ mumukṣur vai śaraṇam ahaṃ prapadye [GTU 1.25] iti śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:834: jñāna-gamyam ucyate tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8] iti śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:835: sarvasya prāṇi-mātrasya hṛdi dhiṣṭhitaṃ niyantṛtayādhiṣṭhāya sthitam ity ucyate antaḥ-praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām [TaittĀ 3.11.10] iti śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:836: na ca sarvataḥ pāṇīty ādi pañcakaṃ jīva-paratayaiva neyaṃ tat-prakaraṇatvādi-vācyaṃ jīvavad īśvarasyāpi kṣetrajñatvena prakṛtatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:841: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:843: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāri-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati itīti /
GE07bhg4c13u:846: jñeyaṃ cānādimat paraṃ brahmety ādi viṣṭhitam ity antam /
GE07bhg4c13u:847: vasiṣṭhādibhir vistareṇoktaṃ sarvam api mayā saṅkṣepeṇoktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:849: pūrvādhyāyokta-lakṣaṇo mad-bhakto vijñāya mad-bhāvāya brahmatvāyopapadyate yogyo bhavati //18//
GE07bhg4c13u:851: uktaṃ kṣetrādikam adhikāriṇaṃ phalaṃ ca vadann upasaṃharati itīti /
GE07bhg4c13u:852: iti anena pūrvoktena prakāreṇa kṣetraṃ mahā-bhūtādi-dhṛty-antaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:854: jñeyaṃ cānādimat paraṃ brahma viṣṭhitam ity antaṃ śrutibhyaḥ smṛtibhyaś cākṛṣya trayam api manda-buddhy-anugrahāya mayā saṃkṣepenoktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:855: etāvān eva hi sarvo vedārtho gītārthaś ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:856_0: asmiṃś ca pūrvādhyāyokta-lakṣaṇo mad-bhakta evādhikārīty āha -- mad-bhakto mayi bhagavati
GE07bhg4c13u:856_1: vāsudeve parama-gurau samarpita-sarvātma-bhāvo mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sa etad yathoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:856_2: kṣetraṃ jñānaṃ ca jñeyaṃ ca vijñāya vivekena viditvā mad-bhāvāya sarvānartha-śūnya-paramānanda-bhāvāya
GE07bhg4c13u:857: yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ yathā deve tathā gurau /
GE07bhg4c13u:858: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ //
GE07bhg4c13u:860: tasmāt sarvadā mad-eka-śaraṇaḥ sann ātma-jñāna-sādhanāny eva parama-puruṣārtha-lipsur anuvartate tuccha-viṣaya-bhoga-spṛhāṃ hitvety abhiprāyaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c13u:865: jñeyaṃ jñāna-gamyaṃ ca anādīty ādi dhiṣṭhitam ity antam /
GE07bhg4c13u:866: ekam eva tattvaṃ brahma bhagavat-paramātma-śabda-vācyaṃ ca saṅkṣepeṇoktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:868: yad vā mad-bhakto mamaikāntiko dāsa etad vijñāya mat-prabhor etāvad aiśvaryam iti jñātvā mayi bhāvāya premṇa upapadyata upapanno bhavati //18//
GE07bhg4c13u:869: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ kṣetrādikaṃ taj-jñāna-phala-sahitam upasaṃharati iti kṣetram iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:870: mahā-bhūtāni ity ādinā cetanā dhṛtir ity antena kṣetra-svarūpam uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:871: amānitvam ity ādinā tattva-jñānārtha-darśanam ity antena jñeyasya kṣetra-dvayasya jñānaṃ tat-sādhanam uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:872: anādi mat-param ity ādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ity antena jñeyaṃ kṣetrajña-dvayaṃ coktaṃ mayā /
GE07bhg4c13u:873: etat trayaṃ vijñāya mitho vivekenāvagatya mad-bhāvāya mat-premṇe mat-svabhāvāya vāsaṃsāritvāya kalpate yogye bhavati mad-bhaktaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c13u:876: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api /
GE07bhg4c13u:877: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛti-saṃbhavān //19//
GE07bhg4c13u:878: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk cety etāvat prapañcitam /
GE07bhg4c13u:879: idānīṃ tu yad vikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś cety etat pūrvaṃ pratijñātam eva prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ saṃsāra-hetukatva-kathanena prapañcayati prakṛtim iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:880: tatra prakṛti-puruṣayor ādimatve tayor api prakṛty-antareṇa bhāvyam ity anavasthāpattiḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:884: atra ca parameśvarasya tac-chaktīnām anāditvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca śrīmac-chaṅkara-bhagavad-bhāṣya-kṛdbhir atiprabandhenopapāditam iti grantha-bāhulyān nāsmābhiḥ pratanyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:885: vikārāṃś ca dehendriyādīn guṇāṃś ca guṇa-pariṇāmān sukha-duḥkha-mohādīn prakṛteḥ sambhūtān viddhi //19//
GE07bhg4c13u:887: tad anena granthena tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca ity etad vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c13u:888: idānīṃ yad-vikāri yataś ca yat sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca ity etāvad vyākhyātavyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:889: tatra prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ saṃsāra-hetutva-kathanena yad-vikāri yataś ca yad iti prakṛtim ity ādi dvābhyāṃ prapañcyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:890: sa ca yo yat prabhāvaś ca iti tu puruṣa ity ādi dvyābhyām iti vivekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:891: tatra saptama īśvarasya dve prakṛtī parāpare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe upanyasya etad-yonīni bhūtāni [Gītā 7.7] ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:892: tatrāparā prakṛtiḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇā parā tu jīva-lakṣaṇeti tayor anāditvam uktvā tad-ubhaya-yonitvaṃ bhūtānām ucyate prakṛtim iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:893: prakṛtir māyākhyā triguṇātmikā pārameśvarī śaktiḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇā yā prāg aparā prakṛtir ity uktā /
GE07bhg4c13u:894: yā tu parā prakṛtir jīvākhyā prāg uktā sa iha puruṣa ity ukta iti na pūrvāpara-virodhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:895: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ cobhāv api anādī eva viddhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:896: na vidyate ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yayos tau /
GE07bhg4c13u:899: puruṣasyānāditvaṃ tad-dharmādharma-prayuktatvāt kṛtsnasya jagataḥ jātasya harṣa-śoka-bhaya-sampratipatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:901_0: yataḥ prakṛtir anādir atas tasyā bhūta-yonitvam uktaṃ prāg upapadyata ity āha vikārāṃś
GE07bhg4c13u:901_1: ca ṣoḍaśa pañca mahā-bhūtāny ekādaśendriyāṇi ca guṇāṃś ca sattva-rajas-tamo-rūpān
GE07bhg4c13u:904: paramātmānam uktvā kṣetra-jña-śabda-vācyaṃ jīvātmānaṃ vaktuṃ kutas tasya māyā-saṃsleṣaḥ,
GE07bhg4c13u:905: kadā tad-ārambho 'bhūd ity apekṣāyām āha prakṛtiṃ māyāṃ puruṣaṃ jīvaṃ cobhāv apy anādī na vidyate ādi kāraṇaṃ yayos tathābhūtau viddhi anāder īśvarasya mama śaktitvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:906: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:907: ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
GE07bhg4c13u:908: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
GE07bhg4c13u:910: iti mad-ukter māyā-jīvayor api mac-chaktitvena anāditvāt tayoḥ saṃśleṣo 'pi anādir iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:911_0: tatra mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭayor api tayor vastutaḥ pārthakyam asti eva ity āha vikārāṃś
GE07bhg4c13u:911_1: ca dehendriyādīn guṇāṃś ca guṇa-pariṇāmān sukha-duḥkha-śoka-mohādīn prakṛti-sambhūtān
GE07bhg4c13u:911_2: prakṛty-udbhūtān viddhīti kṣetrākāra-pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛteḥ sakāśād bhinnam eva jīvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:912_0: baladevaḥ : evaṃ mitho vivikta-svabhāvayor anādyoḥ prakṛti-jīvayoḥ saṃsargasyānādi-kālikatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:912_1: saṃsṛṣṭayos tayoḥ kārya-bhedas tat-saṃsargasyānādi-kālikasya hetuś ca nirūpyate prakṛtim ity ādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:914: mithaḥ sampṛktau prakṛti-puruṣāv ubhāv anādyeva viddhi madīya-śaktitvān nityāv eva jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c13u:915: tayor mac-chaktitvaṃ tu puraivoktaṃ bhūmir āpaḥ ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c13u:916: anādi-saṃsṛṣṭayor api tayoḥ svarūpa-bhedo 'stīty āśayenāh vikārān dehendriyādīn /
GE07bhg4c13u:917: guṇāṃś sukha-duḥkhāni prakṛti-sambhavān prākṛtān na tu jaivān viddhīti kṣetrātmanā pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛter anyo jīva iti darśitam //19//
GE07bhg4c13u:922: śrīdharaḥ : vikārāṇāṃ prakṛti-sambhavatvaṃ darśayan puruṣasya saṃsāra-hetutvaṃ darśayati kāryeti /
GE07bhg4c13u:925: teṣāṃ kartṛtve tad-ākāra-pariṇāme prakṛtir hetur ucyate kapilādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:926: puruṣo jīvas tu tat-kṛta-sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:927: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yadyapi acetanāyāḥ prakṛteḥ svataḥ-kartṛtvaṃ na sambhavati tathā puruṣasyāpy avikāriṇo bhoktṛtvaṃ na sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c13u:929: tac cācetanasyāpi cetanādṛṣṭa-vaśāt caitanyādhiṣṭhitatvāt sambhavati yathā vahner ūrdhva-jvalanaṃ vayos tiryag gamanaṃ vatsādṛṣṭa-vaśāt gostanya-payasaḥ kṣaraṇam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c13u:930: ataḥ puruṣa-sannidhānāt prakṛteḥ kartṛtvam ucyate bhoktṛtvaṃ ca sukha-duḥkha-saṃvedanaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:931: tac ca cetana-dharma eveti prakṛti-sannidhānāt puruṣasya bhoktṛtvam ucyate iti //20//
GE07bhg4c13u:933: vikārāṇāṃ prakṛti-sambhavattvaṃ vivecayan puruṣasya saṃsāra-hetutvaṃ darśayati kāryeti /
GE07bhg4c13u:934: kāryaṃ śarīraṃ karaṇānīndriyāṇi tat-sthāni trayodaśa dehārambhakāṇi bhūtāni viṣayāś ceha kārya-grahaṇena gṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c13u:935: guṇāś ca sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakāḥ karaṇāśrayatvāt karaṇa-grahaṇena gṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c13u:936: teṣāṃ kārya-karaṇānāṃ kartṛtve tad-ākāra-pariṇāme hetuḥ kāraṇam prakṛtir ucyate maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:938: evaṃ prakṛteḥ saṃsāra-kāraṇatvaṃ vyākhyāya puruṣasyāpi yādṛśaṃ tat tad āha puruṣo kṣetrajñaḥ parā prakṛtir iti prāg vyākhyātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:939: sa sukha-duḥkhānāṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohānāṃ bhogyānāṃ sarveṣām api bhoktṛtve vṛtty-uparaktopalambhe hetur ucyate //20//
GE07bhg4c13u:944: kartāra indriyādhiṣṭhātāro devās tatra tathādhyāsena puruṣa-saṃsargāt kāryādi-rūpeṇa pariṇatā syād avidyākhyayā sva-vṛttyā tad-adhyāsa-pradā ca syād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:945: tat-kṛta-sukha-duḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve puruṣo jīva eva hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:946: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yadyapi kāryatva-kāraṇatva-kartṛtva-bhoktṛtvāni prakṛti-dharmā eva syus tad api kāryatvādiṣu jaḍāṃśa-prādhānyāt,
GE07bhg4c13u:948: prādhānyena vyapadeśā bhavantīti nyāyāt kāryatvādiṣu prakṛtir hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:949: bhoktṛtve puruṣo hetur ity ucyate iti //20//
GE07bhg4c13u:950: baladevaḥ : atha saṃsṛṣṭayos tayoḥ kārya-bhedam āha kāryeti śarīraṃ kāryaṃ jñāna-karma-sādhakatvād indriyāṇi kāraṇāni teṣāṃ kartṛtve tat-tad-ākāra-sva-pariṇāme prakṛtir hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:951: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi ity agrimāt sva-saṃsargeṇa sacetanāṃ prakṛtiṃ puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhati /
GE07bhg4c13u:952: tad-adhiṣṭhitā tu sā tat-karmāṇu-guṇyena pariṇamamānā tat-tad-dehādīnāṃ sraṣṭrīti prakṛtyārpitānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ bhoktṛtve puruṣo hetus teṣāṃ bhoge sa eva kartey arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:954: tac ca śarīrādi-kartṛtvaṃ tu tad-adhiṣṭhātāyāḥ prakṛter iti puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ mukhyam /
GE07bhg4c13u:955: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ity ādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:960: puruṣaḥ prakṛti-stho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān /
GE07bhg4c13u:962: śrīdharaḥ : tathāpy avikāriṇo janma-rahitasya ca bhoktṛtvaṃ katham iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:965: prakṛti-sthas tat-kārye dehe tādātmyena sthitaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:967: asya ca puruṣasya satīṣu devādi-yoniṣu asatīṣu tiryag-ādi-yoniṣu yāni janmāni teṣu guṇa-saṅgo guṇaiḥ śubhāśubha-karma-kāribhir indriyaiḥ saṅgaḥ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c13u:969: yat puruṣasya sukha-duḥkha-bhoktṛtvaṃ tādātmyenopagataḥ prakṛti-stho hy eva puruṣo bhuṅkte upalabhate prakṛti-jān guṇān /
GE07bhg4c13u:970: ataḥ prakṛti-ja-guṇopalambha-hetuṣu sad-asad-yoni-janmasu sad-yonayo devādyās teṣu hi sāttvikam iṣataṃ phalaṃ bhujyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:971: asad-yonayaḥ paśv-ādyās teṣu hi tāmasam aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhujyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:972: atas tan nāsya puruṣasya guṇa-saṅgaḥ sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇātmaka-prakṛti-tādātmyābhimāna eva kāraṇam /
GE07bhg4c13u:973: na tv asaṅgasya tasya svataḥ saṃsāra ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:974: athavā guṇa-saṅgo guṇeṣu śabdādiṣu sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakeṣu saṅgo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāma iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c13u:975: sa evāsya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu kāraṇam sa yathā-kāmo bhavati tat kratur bhavati yat kratur bhavati tat karma kurute yat karma kurute tad abhisampadyate [BAU 4.4.5] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:979: kintu tatra anādy-avidyā-kṛtenādhyāsena eva karṭrva-bhoktṛtvādikaṃ tadīyam api dharmaṃ svīyaṃ manyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:980: tata evāsya saṃsāra ity āha puruṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:982: prakṛtijān antaḥkaraṇa-dharmān śoka-moha-sukha-duḥkhādīn guṇān svīyān eva abhimanyamāno bhuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c13u:985: kva bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha satīṣu devādi-yoniṣu asatīṣu tiryag-ādi-yoniṣu śubhāśubha-karma-kṛtāsu yāni janmāni teṣu //21//
GE07bhg4c13u:986: baladevaḥ : prakṛty-adhiṣṭhāne sikhādibhoge ca puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam ity etat sphuṭayati tasya prakṛti-saṃsarge hetuṃ ca darśayati puruṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:987_1: prāna-viśiṣṭaḥ sann eva tat-kṛtān guṇān sukhādīn bhuṅkte 'nubhavati kvety āha sad iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:988: satīṣu deva-mānavādiṣv asatīṣu paśu-pakṣy-ādiṣu ca sādhv-asādhu-racitāsu yoniṣu yāni janmādīni teṣv iti tatra tatra puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam /
GE07bhg4c13u:992: sa ca bhoktṛtvād bhogyān viṣayān spṛhayaṃs tad-arpita-kāmanādi-sannihitāṃ prakṛtim āśrayiṣyati yāvat sat-prasaṅgāt tat-tad-vāsanā kṣīyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:993: tat-kṣaye tu parātma-dhāma-sukhāni bhuṅkte so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā ity ādi śrutibhya iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:994: yat tu prakṛter ity ādeḥ kārya-kāraṇety ādeḥ prakṛtyaiva cety āder nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ ity ādeś cāpātatārtha-grāhibhiḥ sāṅkhyaiḥ prakṛter eva kartṛtvam uktaṃ,
GE07bhg4c13u:995: tat kila rabhasābhidhānam eva loṣṭra-kāṣṭhavad acetanāyās tasyās tattva-sambhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:997: tac ca cetanasyaiveti śrutir āha - vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:999: eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā rasayitā ghrātā mantā boddhā kartā nijñānātmā puruṣaḥ ity ādikam /
GE07bhg4c13u:1000: yac ca puruṣa-sannidhānāc caitanyādhyāsāt tasyās tattvam ity āhus tan na /
GE07bhg4c13u:1001: yat sannidhyadhasta-caitanyāt tasyāḥ kartṛtvaṃ tat tasyaiva sannihitasyeti suvacatvāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:1002: na khalu tapāyaso dagdhṛtvam ayo-hetukam api tu vahni-hetukam eva dṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c13u:1003: na ca calati jalaṃ phalati tarur itivaj jaḍāyās tasyās tattva-siddhir jalādiṣv antaryāmy-adhiṣṭhitatveneṣṭāsiddher vidhāyaka-śruti-vyākopāc caited evam /
GE07bhg4c13u:1004: na hi jaḍa-prakṛtim uddiśya svargādi-phalakaṃ jyotiṣṭomādi-mokṣa-phalakaṃ dhyānaṃ ca smṛtir vidhatte 'pi tu cetanam eva bhoktāram uddiśyeti puruṣasyaiva kartṛtvam /
GE07bhg4c13u:1005_0: tac ca prakṛter iti yad uktaṃ tat tu tad-vṛtti-prācuryād eva yathā kareṇa bibhrati
GE07bhg4c13u:1005_1: puruṣe karo bibhartīti vyapadeśas tathā prakṛtyā kurvati puruṣe prakṛtiḥ karotīti sa bhaved ity eke,
GE07bhg4c13u:1007: na tu tair viyuktasya śuddhasyety ataḥ prakṛtes tad ity apare //21/
GE07bhg4c13u:1011: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c13u:1012: śrīdharaḥ : tad anena prakāreṇa prakṛty-avivekād eva puruṣasya saṃsāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1014: ity āśayena tasya svarūpam āha upadraṣṭeti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1015: asmin prakṛti-kārye dehe vartamāno 'pi puruṣaḥ paro bhinna eva /
GE07bhg4c13u:1017: tatra hetavaḥ yasmād upadraṣṭā pṛthag-bhūta eva samīpe sthitvā draṣṭā sākṣīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1021: tathā aiśvaryeṇa rūpeṇa bhartā vidhāyaka iti coktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1023: mahāṃś cāsau īśvaraś ca sa brahmādīnām api patir iti ca paramātmā vāntaryāmīti coktaḥ śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1024: tathā ca śrutiḥ eṣa sarveśvara evsa bhūtādhipatir loka-pālaḥ ity ādi //22//
GE07bhg4c13u:1026: tad evaṃ prakṛti-mithyā-tādātmyāt puruṣasya saṃsāro na svarūpeṇety uktam /
GE07bhg4c13u:1027: kīdṛśaṃ punas tasya svarūpaṃ yatra na sambhavati saṃsāraḥ ?
GE07bhg4c13u:1028: ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ tasya svarūpaṃ sākṣān nirdiśann āha upadraṣṭeti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1029: asmin prakṛti-pariṇāme dehe jīva-rūpeṇa vartamāno 'pi puruṣaḥ paraḥ prakṛti-guṇāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ paramārthato 'saṃsārī svena rūpeṇety artahḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1030: yata upadraṣṭā yatha ṛtvig-yajamāneṣu yajña-karma-vyāpṛteṣu tat-samīpastho 'nyaḥ svayam avyāpṛto yajña-vidyā-kuśalatvād ṛtvig-yajamāna-vyāpāra-guṇa-doṣāṇām īkṣitā,
GE07bhg4c13u:1031: tadvat kārya-karaṇa-vyāpāreṣu svayam avyāpṛto vilakṣaṇas teṣāṃ kārya-karaṇānāṃ sa-vyāparāṇāṃ samīpastho draṣṭā na tu kartā puruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1032: sa yat tatra kiṃcit paśyaty ananvāg atas
GE07bhg4c13u:1033: tena bhavaty asaṅgo hy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ [BAU 4.3.15] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1034: athavā, deha-cakṣur-mano-buddhy-ātmāno draṣṭṛṣu madhye bāhyān dehādīn apekṣyātyavyavahito draṣṭātmā puruṣa upadraṣṭā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1035: upa-śabdasya sāmīpyārthatvāt tasya cāvyavadhāna-rūpasya pratyag-ātmany eva paryavasānāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:1036: anumantā ca kārya-karaṇa-pravṛttiṣu svayam apravṛtto 'pi pravṛtta iva saṃnidhi-mātreṇa tad-anukūlatvād anumantā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1037: athavā, sva-vyāpāreṣu pravṛttān dehendriyādīn na nivārayati kadācid api tat-sākṣi-bhūtaḥ puruṣa ity anumantā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1038: sākṣī cetā [GTU 2.96, Puruṣa-bodhinī] iti śruteḥ / bhartā
GE07bhg4c13u:1039: bhartā dehendriya-mano-buddhīnāṃ saṃhatānāṃ caitanyābhāsa-viśiṣṭānāṃ sva-sattayā sphuraṇena ca dhārayitā poṣayitā ca /
GE07bhg4c13u:1040: bhoktā buddheḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakān pratyayān svarūpa-caitanyena prakāśayatīti nirvikāra evopalabdhā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1041: maheśvaraḥ sarvātmatvāt svatantratvāc ca mahān īśvaraś ceti maheśvaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1042: paramātmā dehādi-buddhy-antānāṃ avidyayātmatvena kalpitānām paramaḥ prakṛṣṭa upadraṣṭṛtvādi-pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭa ātmā paramātmā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1043: ity anena śabdenāpi uktaḥ kathitaḥ śrutau /
GE07bhg4c13u:1044: ca-kārād upadraṣṭety-ādi-śabdair api sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1045: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ [Gītā 15.17] ity agre vakṣyate //22//
GE07bhg4c13u:1048: yadyapi anādi mat-paraṃ brahma ity ādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam ity anena ca sāmānyataḥ paśeṣataś ca paramātmā prokta eva,
GE07bhg4c13u:1049: tad api tasya jīvātma-sāhityenāpi pṛthag eva spaṣṭatayā dehasthatva-jñāpanārtham iyam uktir jñeyā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1050: asmin dehe paro 'nyaḥ puruṣo yo maheśvarḥ sa paramātmeti cāpy uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1051: paramātmeti ca nāmnāpy ukto bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1052: tatra parama-śabda ekātmavāda-pakṣe svāṃśa iti dyotanārtho jīvasya upa samīpe pṛthak-sthita eva draṣṭā sākṣī /
GE07bhg4c13u:1057: baladevaḥ : dehe sukhādibhokṭrayāvasthitaṃ jīvam uktvā niyantṛtayā tatrāvasthitam īśvaram āha upadraṣṭeti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1058: asmin dehe paro jīvād anyaḥ puruṣo 'sti yo maheśvaraḥ paramātmeti proktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1060: anumantānumati-dātā tad-anumatiṃ vinā jīvaḥ kiñcid api kartuṃ na kṣama ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1063: sarvataḥ pāṇi ity ādibhir uktasyāpīśasya jīvena saha sthitiṃ vaktuṃ punar uktiḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c13u:1066: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha /
GE07bhg4c13u:1068: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prakṛti-puruṣa-viveka-jñāninaṃ stauti ya evam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1069_0: evam upadraṣṭṛtvādi-rūpeṇa puruṣaṃ yo vetti prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha sukha-duḥkhādi-pariṇāmaiḥ
GE07bhg4c13u:1069_1: sahitāṃ yo vetti sa puruṣaḥ sarvathā vidhim atilaṅghyeha vartamāno 'pi punar nābhijāyate /
GE07bhg4c13u:1072: tad evaṃ sa ca yo yat prabhāvaś ca [Gītā 13.4] iti vyākhyātam idānīṃ yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute ity uktam upasaṃharati ya evam iti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1073_0: ya evam uktena prakāreṇa vetti puruṣam ayam aham asmīti sākṣātkaroti prakṛtiṃ cāvidyāṃ
GE07bhg4c13u:1073_1: guṇaiḥ sva-vikāraiḥ saha mithyā-bhūtām ātma-vidyayā bādhitāṃ vetti nivṛtte mamājñāna-tāt-kārye iti,
GE07bhg4c13u:1074: sa sarvathā prārabdha-karma-vaśād indravad vidhim atikramya vartamāno 'pi bhūyo na jāyate patite 'smin vidvac-charīre punar deha-grahaṇaṃ na karoti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1075: avidyāyāṃ vidyayā nāśitāyāṃ tat-kāryāsaṃbhavasya bahudhoktatvāt tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvārdhayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśāt [Vs 4.1.13] iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c13u:1076: api-śabdād vidhim anatikramya vartamānaḥ sva-vṛttastho bhūyo na jāyata iti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c13u:1083: evaṃ mad-ukta-vidhayā mitho viviktatayā yaḥ puruṣaṃ maheśvara-prakṛtiṃ ca jīvaṃ ca vetti /
GE07bhg4c13u:1084: sarvathā vyavahāra-samparkeṇa vartamāno 'pi bhūyo nābhijāyate dehānte vimucyata ity arthaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c13u:1087: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā /

GE07bhg4c13u:1297: tatra vyayo dvedhā dharmi-svarūpasyaivotpattimattayā vā dharmi-svarūpasyānutpādyatve 'pi dharmāṇām evotpatty-ādimattayā vā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1300: sā ca nāsti sarvadā sata ātmanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1303: tad-abhāve ca tad-uttara-bhāvino bhāva-vikārā na sambhavanty eva /
GE07bhg4c13u:1307: na hi dharmiṇam avikṛtya kaścid dharma upaity apaiti vā dharma-dharmiṇos tādātmyād ayaṃ tu nirdharmako 'to na dharma-dvārāpi vyetīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1308: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā [BAU 4.5.14] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1309: yasmād eṣa jāyate 'sti vardhate vipariṇamate 'pakṣīyate vinaśyatīty evaṃ ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-śūnya ādhyāsikena sambandhena śarīra-stho 'pi tasmin kurvaty ayam ātmā na karoti /

GE07bhg4c13u:1311: yato na lipyate na tv ayam akartṛtvād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c13u:1312: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkham ity ādīnāṃ kṣetra-dharmatva-kathanāt /

GE07bhg4c13u:1326: tataś cānāditvāt parama-kāraṇatvāt nirguṇatvān nirgatā guṇaḥ sṛṣṭyādayo yatas tasya bhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāc ca jīvātmano vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ paramātmā /
GE07bhg4c13u:1328: śarīra-stho 'pi tad-dharmāgrahaṇāt na karoti jīvavat na kartā,

GE07bhg4c13u:1331_1: etebhya eva bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānu vinaśyati na prety asaṃjñāsti iti jīvasya

GE07bhg4c13u:1339: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetuṃ sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti /

GE07bhg4c13u:1353: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ /

GE07bhg4c13u:1360_0: yathā ravir eka eva kṛtsnaṃ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ dehendriya-saṃghātaṃ rūpavad vastu-mātram
